We need to produce JSON with summary, business_intent, keywords list. Class MemberAccessNode. No method details beyond __init__ and __repr__ standard. So we infer purpose: likely part of an AST (abstract syntax tree) representing member access (e.g., object.property). So class responsibility: represent member access node in syntax tree, storing target object and member name, maybe location. Business intent: used in parsing/compiling to model member access expressions. Keywords: AST, member access, node, expression, property, field, parsing, compiler, syntax tree.

Let's craft summary: "Represents a member access expression in an abstract syntax tree, encapsulating the object being accessed and the member name." Business intent: "Facilitates parsing and analysis of code by modeling member access operations for further processing such as code generation or interpretation." Keywords list.
